=====================
Sumti: le/lo + selbri
=====================

le gerku klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
  (sumti (le) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))
  (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

lo nanmu klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
  (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))
  (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))
